author: Phoenix Business Solutions
title: Phoenix Business Solutions sponsors Law Department Day ILTACON 2015, Las Vegas
text:
Posted: 27 August 2015 
Share: Share on LinkedIn Share on Twitter Share on Facebook Email a link to this page Print this page 
Phoenix Business Solutions, a global leader in Enterprise Content and Email and Document Management, is proud to be one of this year’s exclusive sponsors for the 3rd Annual Law Department & Legal Operations Day to be held Monday, August 31st, in conjunction with ILTACON 2015 at Caesars Palace in Las Vegas. Law Department Day sessions will be located in Forum Ballrooms 21, 22, 23 on the pool level. The ILTACON exhibit hall opens on Monday night, August 31, at 7PM, where Phoenix will be exhibiting at booth #405. 
Driving efficiencies, managing data, security, rising workloads and budget cuts continue to be growing concerns for law departments -- both within law departments themselves and as general counsel tighten requirements on their outside counsel in regards to highly sensitive, confidential data as well as a wide range of issues to drive down the costs of legal work. 
The Law Department & Legal Operations Day at ILTACON Las Vegas is structured to deliver engaged discussions and interactive roundtable sessions with senior counsel and legal technology advisors to some of the world’s largest and most well-known corporations. Attendees include delegates from Purdue Pharma L.P., Flagstar Bank, Toyota Motor Sales, Hilton Worldwide, and many others. 
“We’re pleased to sponsor the 3rd Annual Law Department Day at ILTACON and assist in creating this unique, marketplace of ideas, fostering dialogue that can help professionals ensure their companies can better compete,” says Ben Weinberger. “ILTACON is the premier event for legal technology and these sessions focused specifically on law department issues are invaluable for those responsible for ensuring that their businesses run as efficiently and effectively as possible.” 
In addition to Law Department Day, Phoenix Business Solutions’ Solution Spotlight session (#SS012) highlighting the LPM and Task Management capabilities of its MatterView software will be on Wednesday, September 2, 11:00am-12:30pm, in Octavius Room 1 of Caesars Palace. 
Phoenix Business Solutions’ Chief Strategy Officer, Ben Weinberger, will be a panellist with an all-star group of experts discussing emerging technologies in, “What's That? New and Cool Technologies,” on Wednesday, 2 September, at 3:30pm in Milano Ballroom V & VI. Hashtag: #ILTACON #ILTA134.
